name: fetch-in-flight
description: Prevent multiple fetch requests to the same resource

scripts.build:browser: parcel build src/index.ts --out-dir dist --out-file fetch-in-flight.min.js --target browser
scripts.build:es: parcel build src/index.ts --out-dir dist --out-file fetch-in-flight.esm.js --target electron
scripts.build:umd: parcel build src/index.ts --out-dir dist --out-file fetch-in-flight.umd.js --target node
scripts.build: npm run build:browser && npm run build:es && npm run build:umd

author: Alan J. Fitzpatrick  <alajfit@gmail.com>
